name: GentlemanQuotesbyTheGentlemen'sBrotherhood
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gentleman quotes
des:
Alexa will share a collection of Gentleman Quotes. The quotes may be about masculinity, manhood, and living like a gentleman in the 21st century. Simply say, "Alexa, launch Gentleman Quotes" By enabling this skill, not only will you listen to the daily news and weather that you may have already enabled in your device, but you will also add Gentleman Quotes to your daily lineup of useful information. I tip my hat to you for taking such a dignified step.

At The Gentlemen's Brotherhood, our mission is to help men behave like true gentlemen by sharing with them inspiring quotes, thought-provoking questions, and practical advice. By making this skill a part of your daily routine, you are making a difference in the world by making it a little more courteous and courageous. Help us on our mission by joining The Gentlemen’s Brotherhood.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
